text: All data used is processed in real-time within the Google Drive environment, and we do not maintain a copy of your data outside of Google Drive.
All data used is processed in real-time within the Google Drive environment, and we do not maintain a copy of your data outside of Google Drive.
We access your primary Google Account email address.

We strictly access and use this information in accordance with this privacy policy and Google's privacy standards.
When you choose to log in using your Google account, we request access to specific information from your Google profile to authenticate you and provide a personalized experience on our platform.
Data Retention We retain your Google user data only for as long as necessary to provide our services to you, comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
By choosing to log in with Google, you consent to allow us to access and use your Google user data as specified above.
